item.description:
Hi All: Just a quick update. We have 40+ people signed up already. If you havent already done so, please email "bh_vball@yahoo.com" if you are interested. We will send you an application and answer any questions you may have. You can also see our ad in Craiglist:

http://boston.craigsl...

This is a great time and includes three weeks of drills and basic instruction with coach Sean.



Registration for the Brettl-Hupfer's Coed Outdoor Volleyball League is now open!

Beginner and Intermediate Players

$60 for the volleyball season.

Every Wednesday night from 6:15pm - 8:30pm beginning June 3 the Brettl-Hupfers will be playing volleyball at Artesani Park in Boston. The league runs for 10 weeks and ends with a FREE weekend at the Brettl-Hupfers house in Bartlett, NH from August 21-23 for Championship weekend. Prizes for the winning team and a cookout for everyone are also on the schedule for the weekend as well as hikes and swimming in the Saco River.

New to volleyball? Never played before? No problem - for the first 3 weeks we will have a professional volleyball instructor to do drills and work on team skills. Each group of 2 teams will work with the instructor for a 45 minute session.

• Nets and Equipment will all be Tournament grade
• Must be 21 Years of age
• Minimum of 3 Men and 3 Women per team maximum of 8 players
• Scoring will be Rally Point Style
• Play the whole time (No sitting out - No working)
• Registration will be taken on a first come first serve basis
• Players must play in at least half of the regular season games to be eligible to play in the playoffs
• Teams must have a minimum of 2 Men and 2 Women for games to count towards standings

Register using the PayPal link above or contact one of the organizers to mail payment.
item.how_to_find_us: We will have 3-4 nets set up. We will be close to the canoe rentals area.
item.name: Volleyball Registration
